# xlsxCsvConverterrr

```python
from converter.converter import xlsx_to_csv, csv_to_xlsx


xlsx_to_csv('input_file', 'output_file') # input_file - xlsx file, output_file - path to save csv file
csv_to_xlsx('input_file', 'output_file') # input_file - csv file, output_file - path to save xlsx file

# Functions return True if file had been saved
```
